column2: under severe driving replace oil and filter every 3,000 miles or 3 months whichever comes first

Subaru Super Coolant. 1st replacement interval is 11years/137,500 miles (220,000 km). 2nd replacement interval is 6 years/ 75,000 miles (120,000 km) after the 1st. If towing replace more often. Use Subaru coolant only, do not mix with other types or it will reduce protection. Always add Subaru cooling system conditioner whenever coolant is replaced.

column1: Fuel System - inspect fuel system lines, connections
column2: under severe driving, brake and steering system inspection should be performed every 6000 miles or 6 months whichever comes first
under extremely cold or hot weather replace the filter more often
when used in dusty conditions, the air filter should be replaced more often

column1: Differential fluid - front and rear gear oil
column2: under severe driving replace every 15,000 miles or 15 months whichever comes first
under severe driving replace every 15,000 miles or 15 months whichever comes first
when used in high humidity or mountainous areas replace the brake fluid and clutch fluid every 15,000 miles or 15 months whichever comes first
when used in high humidity or mountainous areas replace the brake fluid and clutch fluid every 15,000 miles or 15 months whichever comes first

column1: Brake - pads, linings, front/rear axle boots, CV joints, axle half shaft, parking brake
column2: under severe driving, brake and steering system inspection should be performed every 6000 miles or 6 months whichever comes first
under severe driving, brake and steering system inspection should be performed every 6000 miles or 6 months whichever comes first

column1: Bearings - front and rear wheel bearing lubricant

column2: a tire should be replaced when the tread wear indicator appears as a solid band across the tread or at .063" tread depth (1.6mm) or less

column1: Cabin air filter - HVAC filter is behind the glovebox
column2: when used in dusty conditions, the air filter should be replaced more often
